# Release Documentation

Verification reports and documentation for MCP Ticketer releases.

## Purpose

This directory contains verification reports and quality gate documentation for each release. These reports ensure that releases meet quality standards and document what was tested and verified.

## Contents

### Verification Reports

- **[v1.4.2 Verification](v1.4.2-verification.md)** - Verification report for v1.4.2 release
- **[v1.4.4 Verification Report](v1.4.4-verification-report.md)** - Verification report for v1.4.4 release

## Release Process

For information about the release process itself, see:
- **[Release Guide](../developer-docs/releasing/RELEASING.md)** - How to create and publish releases
- **[Versioning Guide](../developer-docs/releasing/VERSIONING.md)** - Version numbering scheme

## Related Documentation

- **[CHANGELOG.md](../../CHANGELOG.md)** - Complete changelog for all versions
- **[RELEASE.md](../RELEASE.md)** - Release process documentation
- **[Developer Documentation](../developer-docs/README.md)** - Developer guides and references

Older release documentation has been moved to:
